properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 4 at 3:36AM EST until January 5 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Blacksburg VA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 3
inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph.

* WHERE...In Virginia, Grayson County. In North Carolina, Ashe
and Watauga Counties.

* WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 10 AM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Strong winds could
cause tree damage.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow Squalls, with a sudden increase in
wind and decrease in visibility in snow and blowing snow, are
possible this evening. Blowing snow will continue into Sunday
morning, as the snow diminishes.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 AM EST SUNDAY
